name: Aglide
headline: Natively connect any app to your SSO.
description: Aglide is the next generation identity. Our pioneering agentic technology can connect any application to our customers' SSOs, without using the standard protocols (SAML, SCIM, etc.).

founders.name: Patrick D. McGuckian, Founder
founders.description: Imperial College London alumnus (Design Engineering, specialising in data privacy). Previously COO of Team Repair, a sustainable subscription service teaching STEM & repair.

founders.name: Oliver Colebourne, Founder
founders.description: Design engineer, specialised in software products. Based in London and studied at Imperial College. Previously CTO for Team Repair, helping create the tech behind our award winning sustainable STEM subscription.

### Backed by
![Y Combinator](https://aglide.com/media/YCLogo.png)
### Combinator
# Connect any app to your SSO, without SAML.
### Avoid the SSO tax and manage access to apps that don’t support SAML, with no impact on security or end-user experience.
Get StartedBook Demo
# Access management & SSO for any app.
Users can access any app with their existing SSO credentials or dashboard.
Admins can enable SSO, set conditional access policies, and revoke sessions.
Aglide SSO works just like SAML SSO.
Learn More
![onboarding](https://aglide.com/media/Desktop.png)
![onboarding](https://aglide.com/media/DesktopSM.png)
Single Sign On
# The same secure SSO, none of the SAML hassle.
# Powerful conditional access policies.
Control when and how end-users access their apps. Limit app access to managed devices, require VPNs, or apply georestrictions.
![onboarding](https://aglide.com/media/SSO/ConditionalAccess.png)
# Apps only accessible through Aglide.
Aglide automatically sets account passwords to values end-users can't see or change, so they can only access their apps via Aglide.
![onboarding](https://aglide.com/media/SSO/OnlyAglide.png)
# Instant user access revoking.
Revoke all of a user's sessions in a click - locking them out of everything from their emails to the company's social media accounts.
![onboarding](https://aglide.com/media/SSO/Freeze.png)
# Designed to work with your existing provider.
![logo-Okta](https://aglide.com/media/IdPLogos/OktaLogo.png)
![logo-OneLogin](https://aglide.com/media/IdPLogos/OneLoginLogo-Grey.png)
![logo-Microsoft Entra](https://aglide.com/media/IdPLogos/EntraLogo-Grey.png)
![logo-Google Workspace](https://aglide.com/media/IdPLogos/GoogleLogo-Grey.png)
### Other
### None
![dashboard-Okta](https://aglide.com/media/IdPLogos/OktaGrid.png)
Admins can sync users and groups from their current identity provider.
Users can access their apps from their existing SSO dashboard.
Aglide is designed to fit right in to your unique environment.
Learn More
![onboarding](https://aglide.com/media/IdPLogos/OktaGridSM.png)
IdP Connect
# From unmanaged account to SSO app, in seconds.
With Auto Migrate, you can convert any account into a managed SSO app in seconds.
Aglide customers can be live in a day, with no access down time.
Learn More
![onboarding](https://aglide.com/media/AutoMigrate.png)
![onboarding](https://aglide.com/media/AutoMigrate.png)
Auto Migrate
# More than just SSO.
Integrated password manager
Store everything from credit cards to API keys in Aglide’s encrypted vaults.
![onboarding](https://aglide.com/media/OtherFeatures/PasswordManager.png)
App usage monitoring
See how frequently each app is used, to spot unnecessary accounts and cut bills.
![onboarding](https://aglide.com/media/OtherFeatures/Usage.png)
Shared SSO apps & item vaults
Shared vaults let multiple users access both SSO apps and password manager items.
![onboarding](https://aglide.com/media/OtherFeatures/Shared.png)
Ghost app detection
Aglide detects unmanaged apps - flagging them to you to get them under control.
![onboarding](https://aglide.com/media/OtherFeatures/Ghost.png)
Powerful user grouping tools
Create user groups, linked to your existings IAM, to bulk set rules and permissions.
![onboarding](https://aglide.com/media/OtherFeatures/Groups.png)
Integrated password manager
Store everything from credit cards to API keys in Aglide’s encrypted vaults.
![onboarding](https://aglide.com/media/OtherFeatures/PasswordManager.png)
App usage monitoring
See how frequently each app is used, to spot unnecessary accounts and cut bills.
![onboarding](https://aglide.com/media/OtherFeatures/Usage.png)
Shared SSO apps & item vaults

![onboarding](https://aglide.com/media/OtherFeatures/Shared.png)
Ghost app detection
Aglide detects unmanaged apps - flagging them to you to get them under control.
![onboarding](https://aglide.com/media/OtherFeatures/Ghost.png)
Powerful user grouping tools
Create user groups, linked to your existings IAM, to bulk set rules and permissions.
![onboarding](https://aglide.com/media/OtherFeatures/Groups.png)
# No more tiers. No more SSO Tax.
Aglide is priced to help you save money. Usually, using Aglide SSO instead of SAML for just one app results in customers saving overall.
Calculate SavingsBook Demo
![onboarding](https://aglide.com/media/SSOTax.png)

generated_description:
### Aglide: Bringing Simplicity to Single Sign-On

Founded in 2023 and part of Y Combinator’s Batch S23, Aglide is a fresh player in the identity management space based out of San Francisco. With a compact team of just two, Aglide is tackling one of the IT industry's more cumbersome challenges: integrating disparate applications into a single sign-on (SSO) system without the convoluted protocols you often hear about, like SAML or SCIM.

### What They Do

Aglide's mission is clear: **"Natively connect any app to your SSO."** They leverage something they call “agentic technology” to streamline access management across apps, which means users can log in to any application using their existing SSO credentials. For administrators, this tool provides robust features like conditional access policies, session revocation, and the ability to migrate unmanaged accounts into a secure SSO framework within seconds.

**Key Offerings:**
- **Single Sign-On**: Offers a security model similar to SAML, but without its typical complexities.
- **Access Control**: Admins can set access rules based on device management or geolocation.
- **Password Management**: Aglide comes equipped with an encrypted vault for sensitive information like credit cards and API keys.
- **Ghost App Detection**: It identifies unmanaged applications, allowing companies to maintain control over their digital landscape.

### The Problem with SSO

One of the big issues companies face is what's often referred to as the "SSO tax." This term captures the high costs often associated with integrating SSO systems with existing applications. Aglide sets itself apart by focusing on a cost-efficient model that aims to save businesses money even from the first application switched over to their service.

### Federal to Scale

Despite being in its infancy, Aglide has big ambitions and the backing of Y Combinator, which suggests a bright future ahead. With their unique technology, they promise to make SSO accessible to every app, encouraging businesses to break free from the constraints of traditional protocols and extend their SSO capabilities.

### Conclusion

Aglide is addressing a real pain point in the identity management landscape with a bold new approach to SSO integration. Given their innovative technology and the backing of a notable accelerator, they could indeed be the next big thing, simplifying access management while ensuring security across the board. To learn more, you can visit [Aglide's website](https://aglide.com).
